sections.heading: attendance; rules and regulations
sections.text: The State Board of Education may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out sections 79-201 to 79-209.SourceLaws 1951, c. 276, § 1, p. 928;Laws 1977, LB 39, § 247;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-216;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 14;Laws 2024, LB1329, § 16.AnnotationsThe
